sqlMap.select: select * from pcInfo where num = #pcNum# and b_key = #key#;
select * from computer where c_num = #num# and c_bossKey = #b_key#;
select * from monitor where m_num = #num# and m_bossKey = #b_key#;
select * from keyboard where k_num = #num# and k_bossKey = #b_key#;
select * from mouse where mo_num = #num# and mo_bossKey = #b_key#;
select * from speaker where s_num = #num# and s_bossKey = #b_key#;
sqlMap.update: update pcInfo set os = #os#, ip = #ip# where num = #num# and b_key = #b_key#;
update keyboard set k_code = #k_code#, k_company = #k_company#, k_name = #k_name#, k_connector = #k_connector#, k_type = #k_type# where k_bossKey = #k_bossKey# and k_num = #k_num#;
update mouse set mo_code = #mo_code#, mo_company = #mo_company#, mo_name = #mo_name#, mo_connector = #mo_connector#, mo_type = #mo_type# where mo_bossKey = #mo_bossKey# and mo_num = #mo_num#;
update speaker set s_code = #s_code#, s_company = #s_company#, s_name = #s_name#, s_connector = #s_connector# where s_bossKey = #s_bossKey# and s_num = #s_num#;
